item.title: Popular commands
item.description: Write with your friends! Run a sprint and compete with your writing group! Focus on your writing, share word counts, write the most you can! Popular and fun ways to start a sprint # â†’ see also: [[Sprint command explained|Sprint]] (with full list of sprint options and presets) Standard 15 minute sprint # Start a sprint for the default duration (15 minutes, starting in 1 minute) /sprint Synonyms These do the same thing: /sprint options: for 15 mins in 1 minute /sprint options: for 15 in 1 /sprint options: 15 in 1 Shorter or longer # Start a 5, 30 or 60 minute sprint (can change it to up to 60 minutes)

item.title: Sprint
item.description: The Sprint Command in detail # /sprint options: duration when You can optinally include a “duration” and a “when” parameter, for example: /sprint options: for 10 minutes in 2 min /sprint options: until :30 now /sprint options: for 25 at :15 /sprint options: for however long in a bit The parameters are all optional and can be in any order. /sprint Without any options, the default sprint is for 15 minutes in 1 minute.

item.title: Sprint (admin)
item.description: SprintAdmin (A) and SprintMC (MC) commands Commands # sprint lock # MC To use this command you must have the @SprintMC role, @SprintAdmin role, be an administrator on the server, or be the server owner. /sprint options: lock Begins a sprint which cannot be cancelled except by a Sprint MC. Example: /sprint options: for 30 in 5 endtime 10 lock @Sprinto#2517 sprint for 30 in 5 endtime 10 lock Begins a 30 minute locked sprint with 5 minutes to join and 10 minutes to give a word count.
